---
title: "Statistical Model To Predict The Weight Of Newborns"
author: "Enrico Michelon"
---

```{r}

newborns_dataset <- read.csv("data/neonati.csv")

head(newborns_dataset)
summary(newborns_dataset$Anni.madre)
min_val <- min(newborns_dataset$Anni.madre)
#summary return 0 as min value, meaning that there's at least one missing value. 
#So I excluded all lines with 0 "age" to compute position, variance measures and shape measures.
line <- which(newborns_dataset$Anni.madre == min_val)
summary(newborns_dataset$Anni.madre[-c(line, which(newborns_dataset$Anni.madre == 1))])
```
